channel.title: CarPlay Ultra on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in CarPlay Ultra on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: BMW Confirms It Has No Plans to Offer CarPlay Ultra
item.description: BMW has confirmed it will not support Apple’s next-generation CarPlay Ultra platform in any of its upcoming vehicles. This is the first unequivocal public rejection of ‌CarPlay‌ Ultra by BMW

item.title: BMW Confirms It Has No Plans to Offer CarPlay Ultra
item.description: BMW has confirmed it will not support Apple’s next-generation CarPlay Ultra platform in any of its upcoming vehicles. This is the first unequivocal public rejection of ‌CarPlay‌ Ultra by BMW

item.title: 2025 Aston Martin Vanquish Volante: A-M’s ultimate GT goes topless
item.description: Only a handful of the V12 convertibles will come to the US each year.

item.title: Everything we learned from a week with Apple CarPlay Ultra
item.description: CarPlay Ultra takes over the main instrument display as well as the infotainment.
